prompt: Just to clarify, do we have full discretion on when can we spend the money on our BREX account?
completion: Full discretion within reason. You can buy equipment (laptop, cellphone, etc.) that you use for work. You can expense a meal with your colleagues once a month. But you cannot use it for buying a gift for your mother.

prompt: Can I use the BREX account to pay for my commute to work?
completion: Yes, you can use the BREX account to pay for your commute to work. This would fall under the category of work-related expenses.

prompt: Is it okay to use the BREX account to purchase a new pair of shoes?
completion: No, you cannot use the BREX account to purchase personal items such as shoes. You can only use it for work-related expenses.

prompt: What kind of meals can I expense with the BREX account?
completion: You can expense a meal with your colleagues once a month. This meal should be work-related and not excessive in cost. For example, it could be a team lunch or dinner after a productive day of work.

prompt: Can I use the BREX account to pay for a hotel room when traveling for work?
completion: Yes, you can use the BREX account to pay for a hotel room when traveling for work. This is considered a work-related expense.
